about_the_game:
Introducing the Model Builder: Cars Pack DLC!


Rev up your engines and hit the road with our latest expansion for Model Builder! Get ready to assemble some of the coolest rides around, straight from the comfort of your PC.

Beach Buggy:
Cruise along the sandy shores in style with our Beach Buggy model kit. Perfect for those sunny days by the beach, this little gem will have you feeling the wind in your hair in no time.

Supercar:
Take your modeling skills to the next level with our sleek and powerful Supercar kit. With its aerodynamic design and high-performance engine, this beauty is sure to turn heads wherever you go.

Classic Race Car:
Step back in time and experience the thrill of classic racing with our Vintage Race Car model kit. Inspired by the golden age of motorsport, this nostalgic beauty is a must-have for any car enthusiast.

With the Model Builder: Cars Pack DLC, the possibilities are endless. Customize your rides, paint them to perfection, and display them with pride. Whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out, this DLC has something for everyone.

So what are you waiting for? Get behind the wheel and start building your dream cars today!

Remember: This content requires the base Model Builder game on Steam in order to play.

With the Model Builder: Cars Pack DLC, the possibilities are endless. Customize your rides, paint them to perfection, and display them with pride. Whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out, this DLC has something for everyone.

name: Model Builder: Cars Pack DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit CPU: Intel Core i5-9400 / Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti / AMD Radeon RX 570, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD /NVMe strongly recommended - [please check your 'Steam Library Folder' settings to ensure installation on SSD/NVMe where possible, to avoid 'legacy Hard Drive' impacts on load-times / system performance.]
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 / Ryzen 7 3800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060S / AMD Radeon RX 5700, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Modern SSD/NVMe storage recommended - [please check your 'Steam Library Folder' settings to ensure installation on SSD/NVMe where possible, to avoid 'legacy Hard Drive' impacts on load-times / system performance.]

short_description: Get ready to hit the road with Model Builder: Cars Pack DLC! Build a Beach Buggy for sandy adventures, a sleek Supercar for high-speed thrills, and a Vintage Race Car for classic racing vibes. Customize, paint, and display your rides with pride. Start building your dream cars!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
